settings.helpText: Include page in sitemap for search engines, menus and breadcrumbs
Date the article was published (if different from create date)
Include page in sitemap for search engines, menus and breadcrumbs
The slug is used to identify the correct navigation for your site. Don't change this if the navigation is in use!
Alternative text for those who cannot see the image. Remember to keep it short, and skip it if the image is purely decorative.
The caption is displayed below the image and gives extra context to the image.
Name of photographer or creator of the image to give them credit.
The AI generated image will be inspired by this text.
Date the article was published (if different from create date)
Include page in sitemap for search engines, menus and breadcrumbs
